name: blood pressure
short_description: According to a recent survey, compared to ten years ago the prevalence of hypertension is becoming younger. The number of hypertension patients at thirty to forty year-old increases significantly. In fact, 1/4 of the men at thirty or forty year old have blood pressure problem. The experts say the begining situation of this kind of patients start in the critical hypertension status. Generally, the critical hypertension will not show symptoms of dizziness and other specifics. It is often neglected because it can not be noticed by occasional examination. If the patients do not take enough rest, and catch up with the overly excited, the specs of hypertension will appear.
